name: Fixed aspect ratio in Figma Auto Layout
description:
Change the width of Auto Layout component keeping the aspect ratio of its child element. It's perfect for card components, thumbnail images, video frames etc.


Currently available ratios: 1:1, 5:4, 4:3, 3:2, 16:10, 1.618:1 (golden ratio), 16:9, 2:1, 21:9 — all in landscape and portrait orientation. Even more added: each ratio has a 50% height pair for vertical centering of nested elements.


More details of how it works in these articles:

  • Figma components with a fixed aspect ratio elements
  • Figma Auto Layout: objects on top of the fixed aspect ratio elements


Updated


  • Now components are fylly customizable — You don't need to detach instances to nest your own elements.
